featureType.name: neighbourhood-statistics
featureType.title: Neighbourhood Statistics
featureType.nativeCRS: GEOGCS["WGS 84", DATUM["World Geodetic System 1984", SPHEROID["WGS 84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563, AUTHORITY["EPSG","7030"]], AUTHORITY["EPSG","6326"]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0, AUTHORITY["EPSG","8901"]], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH], AUTHORITY["EPSG","4326"]]

latLonBoundingBox.crs: GEOGCS["WGS84(DD)", DATUM["WGS84", SPHEROID["WGS84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH]]

virtualTable.name: neighbourhood-statsistics
virtualTable.sql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT gid, name, geom, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM incidents i WHERE ST_Within(i.geom, n.geom) AND date BETWEEN '%STARTDATE%' AND '%ENDDATE%' AND crime = ANY(ARRAY[%CRIME%])) AS crimecount, (SELECT array_to_json(array_agg(row_to_json(i)))::text FROM (SELECT crime, COUNT(*) AS count FROM incidents i WHERE ST_Within(i.geom, n.geom) AND date BETWEEN '%STARTDATE%' AND '%ENDDATE%' AND crime = ANY(ARRAY[%CRIME%]) GROUP BY crime) i) AS stats, (SELECT array_to_json(array_agg(row_to_json(i)))::text FROM (SELECT crime, COUNT(*) AS count, date FROM incidents i WHERE ST_Within(i.geom, n.geom) AND date BETWEEN '%STARTDATE%' AND '%ENDDATE%' AND crime = ANY(ARRAY[%CRIME%]) GROUP BY crime, date) i) AS periodicstats FROM neighbourhoods n WHERE ST_Intersects(n.geom, ST_MakeEnvelope(%AREA%))) t1
